      • compute

        public ComputeCycle compute(Connections connections,
                   int[] activeColumns,
                   boolean learn)
        Feeds input record through TM, performing inferencing and learning
        Parameters:
        connections - the connection memory
        activeColumns - direct proximal dendrite input
        learn - learning mode flag
        Returns:
        ComputeCycle container for one cycle of inference values.

      • computeFn

        public ComputeCycle computeFn(Connections c,
                     java.util.Set<Column> activeColumns,
                     java.util.Set<Cell> prevPredictiveCells,
                     java.util.Set<DistalDendrite> prevActiveSegments,
                     java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> prevActiveSynapsesForSegment,
                     java.util.Set<Cell> prevWinnerCells,
                     boolean learn)
        Functional version of #compute(int[], boolean). This method is stateless and concurrency safe.
        Parameters:
        c - Connections object containing state of memory members
        activeColumns - proximal dendrite input
        prevPredictiveCells - cells predicting in t-1
        prevActiveSegments - active segments in t-1
        prevActiveSynapsesForSegment - Synapses active in t-1
        prevWinnerCells - ` previous winners
        learn - whether mode is "learning" mode
        Returns:

      • activateCorrectlyPredictiveCells

        public void activateCorrectlyPredictiveCells(ComputeCycle c,
                                    java.util.Set<Cell> prevPredictiveCells,
                                    java.util.Set<Column> activeColumns)
        Phase 1: Activate the correctly predictive cells Pseudocode: - for each prev predictive cell - if in active column - mark it as active - mark it as winner cell - mark column as predicted
        Parameters:
        c - ComputeCycle interim values container
        prevPredictiveCells - predictive Cells predictive cells in t-1
        activeColumns - active columns in t

      • burstColumns

        public void burstColumns(ComputeCycle cycle,
                Connections c,
                java.util.Set<Column> activeColumns,
                java.util.Set<Column> predictedColumns,
                java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> prevActiveSynapsesForSegment)
        Phase 2: Burst unpredicted columns. Pseudocode: - for each unpredicted active column - mark all cells as active - mark the best matching cell as winner cell - (learning) - if it has no matching segment - (optimization) if there are prev winner cells - add a segment to it - mark the segment as learning
        Parameters:
        cycle - ComputeCycle interim values container
        c - Connections temporal memory state
        activeColumns - active columns in t
        predictedColumns - predicted columns in t
        prevActiveSynapsesForSegment - LinkedHashMap of previously active segments which have had synapses marked as active in t-1

      • learnOnSegments

        public void learnOnSegments(Connections c,
                   java.util.Set<DistalDendrite> prevActiveSegments,
                   java.util.Set<DistalDendrite> learningSegments,
                   java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> prevActiveSynapseSegments,
                   java.util.Set<Cell> winnerCells,
                   java.util.Set<Cell> prevWinnerCells)
        Phase 3: Perform learning by adapting segments. 
         Pseudocode:

 - (learning) for each prev active or learning segment
   - if learning segment or from winner cell
   - strengthen active synapses
   - weaken inactive synapses
   - if learning segment
   - add some synapses to the segment
     - subsample from prev winner cells
        Parameters:
        c - the Connections state of the temporal memory
        prevActiveSegments - the Set of segments active in the previous cycle.
        learningSegments - the Set of segments marked as learning burstColumns(ComputeCycle, Connections, Set, Set, Map)
        prevActiveSynapseSegments - the map of segments which were previously active to their associated Synapses.
        winnerCells - the Set of all winning cells (Cells with the most active synapses)
        prevWinnerCells - the Set of cells which were winners during the last compute cycle

      • computePredictiveCells

        public void computePredictiveCells(Connections c,
                          ComputeCycle cycle,
                          java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> activeDendrites)
        Phase 4: Compute predictive cells due to lateral input on distal dendrites. Pseudocode: - for each distal dendrite segment with activity >= activationThreshold - mark the segment as active - mark the cell as predictive
        Parameters:
        c - the Connections state of the temporal memory
        cycle - the state during the current compute cycle
        activeSegments -

      • getBestMatchingCell

        public java.lang.Object[] getBestMatchingCell(Connections c,
                                     Column column,
                                     java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> prevActiveSynapsesForSegment)
        Gets the cell with the best matching segment (see `TM.getBestMatchingSegment`) that has the largest number of active synapses of all best matching segments.
        Parameters:
        c - encapsulated memory and state
        column - Column within which to search for best cell
        prevActiveSynapsesForSegment - a DistalDendrite's previously active Synapses
        Returns:
        an object array whose first index contains a segment, and the second contains a cell

      • getBestMatchingSegment

        public DistalDendrite getBestMatchingSegment(Connections c,
                                    Cell cell,
                                    java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> activeSynapseSegments)
        Gets the segment on a cell with the largest number of activate synapses, including all synapses with non-zero permanences.
        Parameters:
        c - encapsulated memory and state
        column - Column within which to search for best cell
        activeSynapseSegments - a DistalDendrite's active Synapses
        Returns:
        the best segment
